H0.text: Who was the President of France at the time of the Falklands War. Valéry Giscard d'Estaing

H1.text: Who was the President of France at the time of the Falklands War. Jacques Chirac

H2.text: Who was the President of France at the time of the Falklands War. Georges Pompidou

H3.text: Who was the President of France at the time of the Falklands War. Miterand

A4.text: The French president, François Mitterrand, declared an embargo on French arms sales and assistance to Argentina.
